91474.question: How To Make Mason Jar Candles
91474.gt: To make mason jar candles, start by securing the wick to the bottom of the jar with hot glue, then place 2 pencils over the mouth of the jar on either side of the wick. Next, fill a saucepan with 2 inches of water and position a candle-making pouring pot in the pan. Then, add the wax to the pouring pot and use medium heat to melt the wax evenly. Finally, let the wax cool to 130 to 140°F, fill the jar with the wax, and give it 24-48 hours to set before lighting your candle!
91474.pred: To make mason jar candles, you will need to gather your materials, which include mason jars, paint, and other decorative items. First, remove the thick cardstock backing from the decals and place them onto the jars, pressing them firmly in place. Then, use craft paint and a foam brush to coat the outside of the jars, applying two to three coats. After the paint dries overnight, use sandpaper to distress the paint and give the jars a rustic look. Apply a clear coat to the outside of the jars to make the paint look like chalk paint and give the glass a frosted appearance. Fill the jars with popcorn and place the candles inside. Finally, decorate the opening of the jars with raffia, decorative wire, leaves, and other fall items, trimming the pieces to size. Your fall monogrammed mason jar candles are now complete and ready to be displayed and enjoyed.

91517.question: How To Make Scotch Pancakes
91517.gt: To make scotch pancakes, starr by stirring together flour, cream of tartar, bicarbonate of soda, salt, and butter in a bowl. Next, make a hole in the center of the ingredients, then add an egg and break the yolk. Then, add a cup of buttermilk and quickly stir. Finally, place a large dollop in a frying pan or on a griddle, and cook for a few minutes on each side.
91517.pred: To make scotch pancakes, you will need the following ingredients: 1 cup of flour, 1/2 cup of milk, 1/2 cup of water, 1/2 cup of sugar, 1/2 cup of butter, 1 egg, and 1 teaspoon of baking powder. In a large bowl, mix together the flour, sugar, and baking powder. In a separate bowl, beat the egg and add the milk and water. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until the batter is smooth. Melt the butter in a pan over medium heat. Once the butter is melted, add a small amount of batter to the pan and cook until bubbles form on the surface. Flip the pancake and cook until the other side is golden brown. Serve the pancakes hot with your favorite toppings.

91559.question: How To Make Great "Just Add Water" Pancakes
91559.gt: To make great just-add-water pancakes, start by preheating a large skillet for 5-10 minutes. While that's heating up, mix together your boxed pancake mix and some water to make the batter, following the instructions on the box. Don't overmix the batter or else your pancakes won't be as fluffy. Next, grease the preheated pan with some butter and pour some of the batter into it. Finally, flip the pancake once you see bubbles start to rise and cook the other side until its brown.
91559.pred: To make great "just add water" pancakes, you will need the following ingredients: 1 cup of all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup of sugar, 1/2 cup of milk, 1/2 cup of vegetable oil, 1 egg, 1 teaspoon of baking powder, and 1/2 teaspoon of salt. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, vegetable oil, and egg. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined. The batter should still be slightly lumpy. Heat a non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat. Using a 1/4 cup measuring cup, scoop the batter onto the skillet or griddle. Cook the pancakes for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown. Serve the pancakes hot with your favorite toppings, such as butter, syrup, or fresh fruit. Enjoy!

91597.question: How To Make Vegan Pancakes
91597.gt: To make vegan pancakes, start by mixing flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl. Then, in a separate bowl, mix vegetable oil and soy or almond milk. Next, pour the wet ingredients into the bowl of dry ingredients, and stir everything together until the batter is only a little lumpy. Finally, cook 1/4 cup of the batter at a time in a skillet for 2 minutes on each side.
91597.pred: To make vegan pancakes, you will need two ripe bananas, 1 and 1/2 cups of almond milk, 1 and 1/4 cup of oats, half a cup of flour, half a teaspoon of salt, and 2 tbsp of baking powder. First, blend all the ingredients in a blender. Then, turn a pan onto medium heat and spray it with cooking spray. Pour the batter into the pan and cook the pancakes. Once they are done, plate them and add any toppings you like.

91795.question: How To Remove Onion Smell From Hands
91795.gt: To remove the onion smell from your hands, combine 1 tbsp (15 ml) of liquid soap and 1 tbsp (17 g) of salt in a small bowl. Scoop up some of the mixture and scrub your palms, wrists, the back of your hands, in between your fingers, and under your nails with it, then rinse your hands under cold water. Then, while your hands are still wet, grab a stainless steel item, like a pot or utensil. Hold the item under running water and rub it on your hands for 1 minute to eliminate any lingering onion smell.
91795.pred: To remove onion smell from hands, you can touch and rub stainless steel, such as a sink, to get rid of the smell in a few seconds. This trick works with all products made out of stainless steel.

91802.question: How To Boil Lobsters
91802.gt: To boil lobsters, fill a 6-gallon stock pot with 4-5 gallons of water. Add 12 tbsp of salt for each gallon of water, along with thyme, bay leaves, and the juice from a lemon, and bring the water to a boil. Once the water is boiling, use tongs to grasp your live lobsters by the tail and gently dip them into the water one at a time. When the lobsters are in the water, clamp the lid onto the pot tightly and let them boil 8 minutes for each 1 pound of lobster. Stir the lobsters about halfway through the cooking time. The lobsters are ready when the shell is bright red and the meat inside is opaque and white.
91802.pred: To boil lobsters, you need to first put them in a pot of water with salt and boil it. Then, you can add lobster bisque to the pot and cook the lobsters for 15 minutes. After that, you can take the lobsters out of the pot and serve them.

91813.question: How To Clean Leeks
91813.gt: To clean leeks, start by cutting off the part with the roots as well as the dark green, stalky portion on the top, leaving the white and light green portions of the leek. Next, slice the remaining portion of the leek in half lengthwise from the light green top down to the white base, and chop the 2 halves according to your recipe. Then, place all the pieces into a large bowl of water, and swish them around with your hand to get any dirt off. Finally, after soaking the leeks for 5 minutes, drain them and rinse them with fresh water.
91813.pred: To clean leeks, first cut off the roots and remove the outer layer of the leaves. Then, trim both ends of the leek and cut it into four pieces. Finally, wash the leeks thoroughly under cold water, making sure to remove any dirt or soil.

91845.question: How To Garnish Food
91845.gt: If you want to garnish food, use edible garnishes, like fruits, veggies, or seeds whenever you can. To garnish an appetizer or entrée, sprinkle on some sesame seeds for texture or add a lemon wheel to fish and chicken dishes. When garnishing a dessert, try adding little squares of kiwi or orange. If you want something fancier, make a strawberry fan by cutting a clean dry strawberry in half lengthwise. Then, make 4-5 slices from the tip most of the way to the stem and fan them out on the plate for a lovely effect.
91845.pred: To garnish food, you can add fresh herbs like cilantro or parsley on top of the dish. This adds a pop of color and freshness to the dish. You can also add a sprinkle of salt or pepper to enhance the flavor. Additionally, you can drizzle a little bit of olive oil or lemon juice over the dish to add a tangy and zesty flavor.

91870.question: How To Make Hot Water Cornbread
91870.gt: To make hot water cornbread, stir the cornmeal, salt, and sugar together in a mixing bowl. Next, add the shortening and water and stir thoroughly until the shortening melts and the mixture is evenly combined. Then, scoop up heaping tablespoons of the dough and shape it into flattened balls or patties. Finally, fry the patties in hot oil until they're golden brown and let them drain on paper towels before serving them.
91870.pred: To make hot water cornbread, you will need a frying pan, a bowl, a spoon, and a kettle. First, melt some butter in the frying pan. Then, add some cornmeal to the bowl and mix it with a spoon. Next, add some hot water to the bowl and mix it with the cornmeal. Make sure the water is hot, but not too hot. Then, take a spoonful of the mixture and shape it into a patty. Place the patty in the frying pan and cook it until it is brown on both sides. Finally, remove the patty from the frying pan and place it on a paper towel to drain any excess oil. Enjoy your hot water cornbread!

91907.question: How To Remove Cheesecake from a Springform Pan
91907.gt: To remove cheesecake from a springform pan, make sure to chill the cheesecake overnight so that it will be more solid and easier to remove from the pan. If you haven't baked your cheesecake yet, you can line the springform pan with parchment paper to help prevent it from sticking. If you've already baked your cheesecake, run a butter knife under hot water and then run the knife around the edges of the pan. Then, you can unlatch the pan and slide the cake onto a platter.
91907.pred: To remove cheesecake from a springform pan, you should first run a knife around the edge of the cheesecake to loosen it from the pan. Then, you can release the springform pan by releasing the latch on the side. Finally, you can gently lift the cheesecake out of the pan and place it on a plate.

91911.question: How To Roast a Duck
91911.gt: Before roasting a duck, preheat the oven to 300 degrees Fahrenheit while you remove the giblets and use a sharp paring knife to score the fat. Then, place the duck on the second lowest rack in the oven, breast-side up, for 1 hour. After 1 hour, flip the duck over, prick it to release the fat, and roast it for another hour. Repeat this process 4 times, then turn the oven up to 400 degrees. Roast the duck for 10 more minutes at this higher temperature to crisp the skin.
91911.pred: To roast a duck, you need to pat it dry, season it with salt and thyme, and place it in the oven at 190 degrees for 40 minutes per kilo. After 20 minutes, add the potatoes and onions to the tray and toss them every 20 minutes. Once the duck is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it rest in a rack. Then, make a sauce by deglazing the pan with pork port and adding stock. Pour the juices from the duck cavity into the sauce and serve the duck with the sauce and potatoes.

91946.question: How To Make Turon (Bananacue Wrap)
91946.gt: To make turon, start by chopping fresh jackfruit, then cutting a sweet plantain into spears. Roll the sweet plantain pieces in brown sugar, then place your fillings in a lumpia wrapper. Next, roll the wrapper like an egg roll, then seal it by brushing egg whites along the edges. Now that your rolls are ready to be fried, heat oil in a frying pan, then add your rolls, turning them over with tongs halfway through. When both sides are golden brown, take them out of the oil and put them on a paper plate.
91946.pred: The given videos do not provide any information on how to make turon (bananacue wrap).

91947.question: How To Cook Adobong Manok
91947.gt: To cook adobong manok, start by cooking garlic and onion in oil over medium heat until it’s golden brown. Next, add chicken, soy sauce, vinegar, pepper, salt, sugar, water and bay leaves and stir it all together. Bring the dish to a boil, then lower the heat and let it simmer for 30 minutes. When the chicken is tender, remove the chicken from the heat and serve it with rice or potatoes.
91947.pred: I'm sorry, but the given videos do not provide any information on how to cook adobong manok. The first video is about making Malai Kulfi, a traditional Indian dessert, and the second video is about making a dish called "Laiji's powder". There is no mention of adobong manok in either of the videos.

91970.question: How To Make Kwek Kwek
91970.gt: If you want to make kwek kwek, boil a dozen quail eggs, then remove the eggs from the pan. Rinse or soak the eggs in cold water until they are cool to the touch, then peel off the shells using your fingers. Dredge the eggs in flour, then dip them in a batter made of flour, baking powder, and diluted annatto powder. Fry 4-6 of the eggs in vegetable oil over high heat until the batter turns golden-brown and crisp, then transfer them to a plate lined with paper towels until they’re cool enough to eat.
91970.pred:
To make kwek kwek, you will need to follow these steps:
1. Boil the eggs and then peel them.
2. Cut the boiled eggs into small pieces.
3. Mix the egg pieces with the other ingredients, which include chopped green beans, cherry tomatoes, and roasted peanuts.
4. Add some salt and pepper to the mixture.
5. Mix everything together until the ingredients are well combined.
6. Serve the kwek kwek on a plate, garnished with some chopped green papaya salad and roasted peanuts.
7. Enjoy your delicious kwek kwek!

91972.question: How To Make Longganisa
91972.gt: To make longganisa, start by mixing ground pork with soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, bay leaves, paprika, brown sugar, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Then, refrigerate the mixture for at least 2 hours so it gets firm and flavorful. Next, roll the meat into sausage links and stuff it into casing or leave it as is. Finally, fry the sausages in a pan with 1/2 a cup of water until they're golden brown.
91972.pred: To make longganisa, you will need to mix flour, yeast, and water in a bowl. Then, add oil and mix the ingredients together. After that, knead the dough and let it rest for 30 minutes. Once the dough has rested, roll it out and add oil to the surface. Finally, bake the dough in the oven for 20 minutes at 430 degrees Fahrenheit.

91977.question: How To Make Puto (Steamed Rice Cake)
91977.gt: If you want to make puto, or a Filipino steamed rice cake, start by sifting together your rice flour, sugar, and baking powder into a bowl. Add butter, coconut milk, egg, and water, and mix all of the ingredients thoroughly with a wooden spoon or whisk. Pour the mixture into molds or small cupcake pans, then put a little square of cheese on top of each mold. Steam the molds for about 20 minutes, then remove the puto from the molds and serve.
91977.pred: To make puto, you need to mix all the dry ingredients in a mixing bowl, add the wet ingredients, and whisk everything together. Then, prepare your steamer tray by placing cheesecloth on it and wrapping a cloth around the lid. Fill the molds with the batter, steam for 14 minutes, and release them from the molds.

91979.question: How To Make Taho
91979.gt: To make taho, simmer the sago pearls until they get translucent and drain them. Next, combine the sugar, vanilla, and water in a saucepan and bring the mixture to a boil. Then, reduce the heat to low and let the syrup simmer for 1-2 minutes before removing it from the heat. Finally, steam the tofu, cut it into chunks, and place the chunks in cups. Dish the sago pearls over the tofu, pour the syrup on top, and stir the mixture gently.
91979.pred: To make taho, you will need to mix water, yeast, and honey in a bowl. Then, add flour and mix until it forms a dough. Knead the dough and let it rest for 30 minutes. After that, roll out the dough and spread olive oil on it. Let it rest for another 30 minutes. Finally, bake the dough in the oven for 20 minutes at 430 degrees Fahrenheit.

92085.question: How To Build a Fence
92085.gt: To build a fence, start by inserting your posts into the holes and stabilizing them with braces. Next, tamp down dirt or concrete into the holes to fix the posts in place. Then, nail a top and bottom rail running horizontally from the posts, and add center rails and boards, depending on your chosen fence style. Finish by adding several coats of wood sealer to protect your fence from the weather, and painting it in a color of your choice.
92085.pred: To build a fence, you will need to first establish the boundary line and measure the area. Then, you can choose the materials you want to use, such as rough sawn posts, rails, and fence palings. After that, you can dig the post holes, place the posts, and secure them with braces. Next, you can mark the fence posts for the rails and install the rails. Finally, you can install the fence palings and make sure they are level. It is important to follow the instructions carefully and use the right tools to ensure a successful fence construction.

92121.question: How To Remove Mildew and Algae from a Wooden Fence
92121.gt: If you want to remove mildew and algae from a wooden fence using bleach, start by covering the plants with tarps or inverted buckets so they aren’t harmed by the solution. Then, mix 1 part bleach with 2 parts warm water. Next, add 1 teaspoon of mild soap per gallon of water, if it is safe to mix with bleach. Scrub that solution onto the stained areas of the fence and rinse it off with a hose.
92121.pred: To remove mildew and algae from a wooden fence, you can use a spray bottle filled with a cleaning solution and spray it on the affected areas. Then, use a scrubbing brush to scrub the surface and remove the dirt and grime. Finally, rinse the fence with water to remove any remaining cleaning solution.

92371.question: How To Make Mahamri
92371.gt: To make mahamri, start by combining yeast, water, sugar, and flour to make the dough. Then knead the dough and leave it to rise until it’s doubled in size. When the dough is ready, divide it into 5 equally sized balls. Let them rise before you roll out each ball and shape it into a circle. Cut the circles into quarters, and fry the pieces in a deep, wide frying pan. Be sure to use very hot cooking oil, and cook the mahamri on both sides so it's golden brown all over.
92371.pred: To make mahamri, you will need to mix yeast, water, and honey in a bowl. Then, add flour and mix until it forms a dough. Knead the dough and let it rest for 30 minutes. After that, roll out the dough and place it on a baking sheet. Drizzle olive oil on the dough and let it rest for another 30 minutes. Finally, bake the dough in the oven for 20 minutes at 430 degrees Fahrenheit.

92381.question: How To Stop a Dog's Quick from Bleeding
92381.gt: To stop a dog's quick from bleeding, try to remain calm so you don't stress out your dog and remember that your dog isn't at risk from the minor blood loss. First, find a bar of soap and press the bleeding nail into the soap at a 90-degree angle so it's 3-4 millimeters deep. Then, hold your dog's paw still in this position for 3-4 minutes. After a few minutes, gently twist and pull the soap off your dog's nail. If your dog's nail is still bleeding, repeat the process until you've successfully formed a plug with the soap.
92381.pred: To stop a dog's quick from bleeding, you should first apply pressure to the area with a clean cloth or bandage. This will help to stop the bleeding and prevent further damage. If the bleeding is severe or does not stop after a few minutes, you should seek veterinary care immediately. It is important to keep the dog calm and still during this process to prevent further injury.

92404.question: How To Cook a Frozen Pie
92404.gt: To cook a frozen pie, start by preheating the oven to 425°F. Next, place the pie on a foil-lined baking sheet to catch any filling that might drip over the sides of the dish. Once the oven is hot, place the pie on the bottom rack of the oven, so that the top of the pie doesn’t cook faster than the bottom. Bake the pie for 15 minutes before reducing the oven temperature to 350°F. Then, bake it for another 45 minutes, rotating the pie halfway through so it cooks evenly. Finally, remove it from the oven when it’s golden brown and let it cool slightly before serving.
92404.pred: To cook a frozen pie, you need to preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Then, place the pie on a baking sheet and put it in the oven. Bake the pie for 45 minutes or until the crust is golden brown. After baking, let the pie cool for 10 minutes before serving.

92770.question: How To Color Sand
92770.gt: To color sand using food coloring, start by placing ¼ to 1 cup of sand into a plastic zippered bag. Next, add 3 to 4 drops of food coloring, close the bag tightly, then shake and squeeze the bag until the color is evenly distributed. Afterwards, spread the sand evenly along the bottom of a baking sheet and let it dry overnight. Alternatively, place it in a 200 degree F oven for 5 to 10 minutes, then take it out of the oven and let it finish drying for a few more hours.
92770.pred: To color sand, you can use food coloring and mix it with the sand.

93208.question: How To Clean a Driveway
93208.gt: To clean a driveway using household products, start by covering any stained areas with a natural absorbent, like cat litter, baking soda, or cornstarch. If the stain is dry, add some water as well. Then, let the absorbent sit on the stain for 1 hour before sweeping it off. You can also clean stains on your driveway by pouring cola over them, letting it sit overnight, and then blotting and rinsing the area in the morning.
93208.pred: To clean a driveway, you can use a sprayer to apply a chemical solution, such as chlorine, to the surface. The solution should be applied evenly, and the driveway should be left to sit for a few hours before rinsing it off. It is recommended to avoid spraying the solution on areas where children or animals may be present. The video also suggests that the driveway may need to be sprayed again to cover any dark spots.

93220.question: How To Make Stepping Stones
93220.gt: To make stepping stones, choose a mold, like a cake pan or a plastic tub, then coat the mold with petroleum jelly or cooking oil to make removing the stone easier. Prepare concrete according to the instructions on the package, then pour around 2 inches into the mold. Next, choose decorative mosaic pieces, like tiles, sea glass, and seashells, and press them into the concrete so no jagged edges stick out. Allow to set for 2 days, then remove by flipping the container over onto a soft surface.
93220.pred: To make stepping stones, you will need a mold, chicken wire, stained glass, concrete, and a screwdriver. First, put the chicken wire in the mold and add concrete to the bottom. Then, add the momentos, such as horseshoes, helm, wrench, and initials with a heart in the middle. Place the stained glass around the momentos and use a screwdriver to adjust any items that are too far below the concrete. Tap the pieces with a screwdriver to make sure they are firmly embedded in the concrete. Wait 24 hours before taking the stone out of the mold. Clean the stone with a hairdryer and a toothbrush to remove any residue. Once the stone is dry, you can spray it with water or use a hose to clean it.

93229.question: How To Use a Power Washer
93229.gt: Before you use a power washer, put on protective clothing, including goggles, long-sleeved clothing, boots, work gloves, and non-slip shoes. If your power washer is gas powered, make sure to wear ear protection as well. Then, fill it up with fuel. Alternatively, connect it to a grounded power source if it’s an electric model. Next, connect your garden hose to the washer and a spray tip to the nozzle. Position the tip at least 2 feet away from the surface you want to clean. Point the nozzle at a 45 degree angle to the surface, which will help direct flying debris away from you. Once you’re in position, pull the trigger to spray the water. Spray from side to side, taking care not to stay on one spot for too long.
93229.pred: To use a power washer, you need to connect it to a water supply and plug it in. The video shows a man plugging in the power washer and turning it on. The power washer is then used to clean a driveway and a wooden fence. The video also shows how to pack away the power washer after use.

93306.question: How To Blacken Fish
93306.gt: To blacken fish, start by seasoning it with salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, basil, and oregano. Then, heat some olive oil in a stainless-steel pan over medium heat. Next, add the fish and cook it for 5-6 minutes over medium-high heat, flipping it over halfway through. For the last 2-3 minutes, reduce the heat to medium-low. Once the edges of the fish have blackened and it has a smoky color, take it off the heat and serve.
93306.pred: To blacken fish, you can follow the steps shown in the video. First, you need to clean the fish by removing the scales and cutting it into fillets. Then, you can season the fish with salt, pepper, and lemon zest. Next, you can cook the fish in a pan with butter and oil until it is golden brown. Finally, you can serve the fish with mashed potatoes and a lemony, olively sauce.

93344.question: How To Cook Rainbow Trout
93344.gt: To cook rainbow trout in a pan, start by rinsing fillets under cold water and patting them dry with a paper towel. Then, use a basting brush to brush both sides of the fillet with olive oil, and sprinkle with a little salt for flavor. Brush more olive oil into a frying pan and heat it to medium-high before adding fillets skin-side down. Cook each side for about 5 minutes, remove fillets from the pan, and serve with a flavorful topping, like fennel and lemon.
93344.pred: To cook rainbow trout, first, clean the fish and remove the heads. Then, mix butter, extra virgin olive oil, creel seasoning, garlic salt, onion powder, and pepper to make a marinade. Coat the trout with the marinade and let it sit for a few minutes. Place the trout on aluminum foil on the grill and double wrap it to keep the moisture inside. Cook the trout for about 15 minutes at 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Finally, peel the skin off the trout and enjoy the delicious meal.

93350.question: How To Cook Smoked Haddock
93350.gt: To poach smoked haddock, bring it nearly to a boil on the stove with some milk and pepper, then simmer it for about 10 minutes. You can also pan-fry smoked haddock by dredging it in a flour-and-herb mixture before frying it in hot oil for about 8 minutes on the first side and a little less on the second. Want to bake your smoked haddock, instead? Season it with butter and whatever spices you like, wrap it in foil or parchment, and bake it in a 350°F oven for 15-20 minutes or until it’s done.
93350.pred: To cook smoked haddock, you need to poach it in milk. The man in the video poaches the haddock in milk for five minutes. He then removes the haddock from the milk and adds it to the risotto.

93370.question: How To Grill Fish
93370.gt: To grill fish, start by cutting it up into small fillets so it's easier to cook. Then, season or marinate the fillets while your grill is preheating to around 550 degrees Fahrenheit. Once the grill is hot enough, place the fillets directly on the grill grate, reduce the heat to medium, and let them cook for 3-5 minutes. Next, flip the fillets over and let them cook for 3-5 minutes on the other side. Finally, take the fillets off the grill once they're firm and opaque all the way through.
93370.pred: To grill fish, you will need a cast iron griddle, a grill, and a blackening seasoning. First, preheat the grill to a high temperature. Then, season the fish with the blackening seasoning and place it on the griddle. Cook the fish for about 4-5 minutes on each side, or until it is cooked through. You can also add butter to the griddle to add flavor to the fish. Once the fish is cooked, remove it from the griddle and serve it with your favorite sides. Enjoy!

94075.question: How To Make Sunny Side up Eggs
94075.gt: To make sunny side up eggs, start by heating about 1 tablespoon of butter in a skillet over low heat. Then, break a couple eggs into the pan, keeping the yolks intact and whites separated. Next, cover the pan and cook the eggs for 2-3 minutes or until the whites are firm and cooked on the top. Finally, use a spatula to transfer the eggs to a plate before serving.
94075.pred: To make sunny side up eggs, you need to put some oil or butter in a pan and turn on the stove to medium heat. Once the oil is heated, crack the eggs into the pan without breaking the yolk. Cook the eggs for a minute or two until the egg whites start to turn white. Add salt and pepper to taste. Once the eggs are cooked, use a spatula to separate them and place them on a plate.

94170.question: How To Make Macaroni Salad
94170.gt: To make a classic macaroni salad, start by cooking a pound of macaroni in boiling water for 8 minutes. Then, drain and rinse the pasta with cool water and set it aside. Next, whisk together mayonnaise, vinegar, sugar, mustard, salt, and pepper to make the dressing. After that, add chopped or diced celery, pepper, onion, carrots, and parsley to the pasta and mix everything together. Finally, toss the macaroni and vegetables with the dressing, and serve immediately or keep it in the fridge for up to 24 hours.
94170.pred: To make macaroni salad, you will need to cook elbow macaroni according to package instructions. Then, combine the cooked macaroni with mayonnaise and sour cream. Add red onion, sweet relish, celery, and fresh parsley. Mix all the ingredients together and add mustard powder, salt, sugar, and ground black pepper. Transfer the salad to a serving bowl and enjoy.

94655.question: How To Clean Tile with Vinegar
94655.gt: To clean a tile floor with vinegar, first get rid of any loose dirt by sweeping or vacuuming the floor. Then, mix equal parts hot water and white vinegar in a bucket that’s big enough to hold a mop. After you’ve made your vinegar solution, dip a mop in the bucket and wring out any excess liquid before mopping. Once you’ve gone over the floor with the vinegar and water solution, rinse out your mop and mop the floor a second time with plain, hot water.
94655.pred: To clean tile with vinegar, you can use a bottle of vinegar and spray it on the tile. Let it sit for about 5 minutes, then use a cheap brush to scrub the area. You can also use a wet mop to clean the area. This method is effective in removing dirt and grout from the tile.

94902.question: How To Make Muesli
94902.gt: To make muesli, start by mixing 4 cups of grains, such as rolled oats or wheat flakes, and 1 cup of your favorite chopped nuts in a large bowl. Then, stir in 1 cup of dried fruit, like dates, raisins, dehydrated berries, and dried mango. Be sure to store your muesli in an airtight container in a cupboard, where it can stay fresh for up to 2 months. When you're ready to have some of your muesli, serve it with some milk or yogurt in a bowl and enjoy!

95445.question: How To Make Chantilly Cream

Finally, continue to whip the cream until stiff peaks start to form.

95760.question: How To Make Sun Tea

96074.question: How To Make an Ice Cream Cake

96409.question: How To Bend Sheet Metal
96409.gt: To bend sheet metal in a vice, start by marking a line on the metal where you want to bend it. Next, put your wooden or metal form blocks in the vice and clamp your sheet of metal between the forms. If your sheet metal is long, ask a friend to stabilize the part hanging out from the form blocks so it doesn't affect the bend. Then, tap your metal along the bend line with a rubber or plastic mallet until the sheet bends to the angle you want. If you're working with a thick sheet of metal, apply heat from a blowtorch along the bend line to soften it.

96766.question: How To Make Focaccia
96766.gt: To make focaccia, start by mixing yeast, salt, flour, olive oil, and water to make the dough. Then, knead the dough before covering it and proofing it for 2 hours. Next, split the dough in half and flatten each half on a baking sheet drizzled with olive oil. Next, top the focaccia with any herbs, seasonings, or cheese you'd like, and then let it rest for 1 hour. Finally, bake the focaccia for 20 minutes at 425 degrees Fahrenheit.

Add the yeast mixture to the flour mixture and mix well. If the dough is too dry, add more water. Knead the dough until it becomes soft and smooth. Place the dough in a greased dish and let it rise for 3 hours in the refrigerator or 1 hour and 30 minutes outside. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees and place the dish in the oven for 25 minutes. While the focaccia is baking, prepare the toppings. Cut cherry tomatoes in half and squeeze them to release the juice. Cut olives in half. Sprinkle oregano and a little bit of oil on top. Serve the focaccia with a glass of wine.

97035.question: How To Make Catsicles
97035.gt: To make catsicles, first mix goat’s milk, wet cat food, and tuna in a bowl. You can also mix in some cat treats to make your catsicles extra special. Next, pour the mix into individual containers, like Dixie cups, ice cube trays or popsicle molds. Then, cover them with plastic wrap or Tupperware and place them flat in your freezer for at least 24 hours before serving.

97458.question: How To Make KFC Original Fried Chicken
97458.gt: To make KFC original fried chicken, start by blending salt, thyme, basil, oregano, celery salt, black pepper, dried mustard, paprika, garlic salt, ground ginger, and white pepper in a food processor. Then, combine the seasoning with some flour in a bowl. Once you've made the breading, dip the chicken into an egg-buttermilk mixture and then the breading. Finally, fry the chicken in vegetable oil until it's cooked through and crispy.

First, combine paprika, onion salt, sage, garlic powder, oregano, chili powder, black pepper, basil, marjoram, and coriander in a bowl and mix it together. Then, divide the spice mix in half and pour 2.5 liters of filtered water into a pot. Add half of the spice mix, whole allspice, whole black peppercorns, salt, saltpeter, sugar, and bicarbonate of soda to the pot. Bring the pot to a boil, stirring frequently, and then reduce the heat and allow the pot to simmer for 5 minutes. Remove the pot from the heat and let the brine cool completely. Using a carving fork or similar tool, poke holes through the skin of the chicken pieces, then place them in a large sterilized container. Pour the cooled brine over the chicken pieces, put the lid on, and let this cure in your refrigerator for a full 24 hours. After 24 hours, remove the chicken from the brine. Combine 2 cups of all-purpose flour with the other half of the spices, and lightly beat 4 eggs. Dredge the chicken in the flour mixture, then dip it in the egg making sure to wet all of the flour. Dredge the chicken in the flour again making sure to get a good solid coating. Sprinkle a layer of the flour mixture onto a platter, transfer the coated chicken pieces to the platter, and allow the coating to set for 20 minutes. Half fill your wok or pot with oil. Heat the oil to 160c or 325f. Fry the chicken pieces for 20 minutes, turning over halfway. Remove the chicken from the oil, drain on kitchen paper, and serve.

97467.question: How To Make Fried Chicken in the Oven
97467.gt: To make oven-fried chicken with breadcrumbs, start by whisking egg and milk together in a shallow prep bowl and setting aside. In another bowl, whisk together flour, breadcrumbs, baking powder, and seasonings to make a dry coating. Next, cover the chicken in the egg mixture and dip each piece into the dry coating twice. Then, bake the chicken in a heated, buttered pan at 410°F for 10 to 12 minutes. Finally, flip the chicken over and bake for another 5 to 10 minutes.

97602.question: How To Make Bread Sauce
97602.gt: To make bread sauce, first cut a loaf of bread into thick slices and place them on a drying rack to become stale overnight. The next day, peel and cut a white onion into quarters, then stud each quarter with one clove. Next, pour 4 cups (1 liter) of milk into a saucepan, and add the quartered onion along with 2 bay leaves. Add 1 teaspoon (5 mL) of white peppercorn, 2 mace blades, and 1 teaspoon (5 mL) of table salt, and bring the mixture to a near boil over medium heat. Remove the saucepan from the heat, cover it, and let the ingredients infuse for 1 to 2 hours. While you're waiting, break up the bread slices into small cubes, about the size of a crouton. Once the milk mixture is ready, heat it over low heat, and add the bread cubes. The bread will absorb the sauce and thicken it. Cook the sauce for 15 minutes. Just before serving, mix in 2 tablespoons (30 grams) of butter. Add a splash more milk or cream and sprinkle in some nutmeg if you would like. Pour the sauce into a gravy boat or bowl, and enjoy!
97602.pred: To make bread sauce, you will need a stick of butter, three large cloves of garlic, a quarter of a cup of olive oil, and a quarter of a cup of parsley. First, melt the butter and garlic in a saucepan over low to medium heat. Then, add the olive oil and parsley and let the mixture heat up and all melt together. Once the flavors have melded, brush the sauce onto the bread. You can also sprinkle a little bit of salt and Parmesan cheese on top of the bread before baking it in the oven at 450 degrees for 15 minutes. The result is a delicious and crispy bread sauce that is perfect for dipping into soup or using as a side dish.

98111.question: How To Keep Guacamole Fresh

After that, just cover the top of the bowl with plastic wrap and put the guacamole in the fridge until you're ready to eat it!

100901.gt: To make papaya salad, start by crushing yardlong beans, chilies, garlic, shrimp, and peanuts to release their flavors and then mix them together. Next, cut papaya into matchstick-size shreds and cut carrots, sprouts, tomatoes, scallions, cilantro, and basil. After that, combine them all together. To mix the dressing, whisk together lime juice, sugar, fish sauce, and salt until it forms into a thin liquid. Then, add the crushed ingredients to the salad, drizzle the dressing over the top, and toss. If you’d like, you can top with cilantro or basil before serving.
100901.pred: To make papaya salad, you will need a fresh green unripe papaya, chili pepper, fresh garlic, sugar, fresh lime, fermented fish sauce, shrimp paste, cherry tomatoes, and fresh herbs. First, peel the papaya and shave it down with a sharp knife or a julienne shredder. Then, smash the chili pepper and garlic in a mortar and add the sugar. Crush the papaya and lime juice in the mortar and add the fermented fish sauce and shrimp paste. Mix everything together and serve with cherry tomatoes and fresh herbs. Enjoy the delicious and refreshing papaya salad.

100949.question: How To Make Kulfi (Indian Milk Ice Cream)
100949.gt: To make a quick Kulfi, add condensed milk, evaporated milk, and heavy cream to a wide pot. Bring this mixture to a boil and then reduce the heat, letting it simmer for 5 minutes. During this time, stir constantly so it doesn't burn. After 5 minutes, add your cardamom and other spices you like, and let the milk cool on your counter or in refrigerator for 2 hours. Then, add pistachio crumbles to your molds, if you like, before pouring in your milk. Cover and freeze your Kulfi for at least 6 hours before serving.
100949.pred: To make kulfi, you will need 1.5 liters of milk, 1/2 cup of sugar, 3 tablespoons of crushed almonds, 1 tablespoon of crushed cashew nuts, some saffron strings, and 1.5 teaspoons of cardamom powder. Boil the milk in a pot on medium flame, and then add the sugar, almonds, cashew nuts, saffron, and cardamom powder. Stir continuously until the milk reduces to a thick consistency. Let the mixture cool, then transfer it to a mold or container. Place the molds in the freezer for 10-11 hours. Once the kulfi is frozen, remove it from the molds and garnish with crushed almonds.

101033.question: How To Make Bread and Butter Pudding
101033.gt: To make bread and butter pudding, first preheat your oven to 180°C (355°F), and grease a baking dish with softened butter. Then, cut 8 slices of bread in half diagonally, and cut each half in half again. Spread softened butter onto one side of each piece. Place 8 of the pieces into the baking dish with the buttered sides facing up. Next, sprinkle a handful of sultanas or raisins over the bread, followed by a liberal amount of cinnamon. This completes the first layer. Repeat the process to add more layers until you run out of pieces of bread, then set aside. To make the custard, first add 1 1/2 cups (350 mL) each of whole milk and double cream to a small saucepan. Place the saucepan on the stove and heat on low until it starts to steam. While that's heating up, crack 2 eggs into a bowl, and add 2 tablespoons (25 grams) of granulated sugar. Whisk the eggs and sugar until fully blended. Finish the custard by slowly pouring the milk and cream mixture into the egg and sugar mixture, then whisking everything together. Put a strainer inside of another bowl, and pour the custard into it to catch any bits of cooked egg which you can discard. Now, pour the custard evenly over the bread in the baking dish. Sprinkle some nutmeg, cinnamon, and  a bit more sugar over the top of the bread and custard. Let the bread sit for 30 minutes to soak up the custard, then bake it in the oven for 30 to 40 minutes. You'll know it's done when the bread pudding has a golden brown color and the custard has thickened.
101033.pred: To make bread and butter pudding, you will need the following ingredients: bread, butter, marmalade, milk, cream, eggs, lemon zest, sugar, and raisins. First, butter the bread and spread marmalade on top. Cut the bread into triangles and layer it in a baking dish. Then, mix milk, cream, eggs, lemon zest, sugar, and raisins in a bowl. Pour the mixture over the bread and bake in the oven for 30-40 minutes. Serve with ice cream or custard.

101038.question: How To Make Caramel Pudding
101038.gt: To make custard caramel pudding, start by melting the sugar over a medium heat in a dry pan. Once the sugar turns brown, add the water and swirl the pan to mix the caramel. Pour the caramel into ramekins, then heat the milk over a medium heat. When the milk starts to boil, remove it from the heat and beat the eggs and sugar. Finish by mixing the milk into the egg mixture and pouring the pudding through a strainer into the caramelized ramekins. Place the puddings in a tray of water and bake them at 375 degrees F for 35 minutes.
101038.pred: To make caramel pudding, you will need to start by making the caramel. In a pan, add half a cup of sugar and heat it on medium heat. Swirl the pan to help the sugar caramelize faster and avoid burning. Once the sugar starts to caramelize, pour it into a baking tray and spread it evenly. Then, make the pudding by adding five eggs, one can of condensed milk, and one can of water to a bowl. Mix well and add one teaspoon of vanilla extract. Pour the pudding mixture into the baking tray with the caramel and bake it in a water bath at 350F for an hour. After baking, let the pudding cool for half an hour and then run a knife around the edges to release it from the pan. Finally, turn the pudding upside down and serve.

101059.question: How To Make Instant Pudding
101059.gt: To make homemade vanilla instant pudding, mix dry milk, cornstarch, sugar, and salt together in a bowl. Next, slice open some vanilla beans and scrape the seeds out. Mix the seeds into the dry ingredients, and cut the remainder of the vanilla beans into small pieces and place them in a jar. Then, add the dry ingredients to the jar as well for a rich vanilla flavor. When you’re ready to make your pudding, add milk and cook in a saucepan until the mixture thickens, which should take 3-5 minutes.
101059.pred: To make instant pudding, you need to mix half a cup of sugar, 1/3 cup of dry milk, and a third cup of clear gel together thoroughly. Then, add a quarter teaspoon of salt and a quarter teaspoon of vanilla to two cups of water and whisk it into the dry mix. The result is a prepper-style instant pudding that can be used for various purposes.

101089.question: How To Make Yorkshire Pudding
101089.gt: To make Yorkshire pudding, start by mixing 3/4 cup of flour and 1/2 teaspoon of salt together in a bowl. Then, in a separate bowl, whisk 3 eggs and 3/4 cup of milk. Next, combine the dry and wet ingredients, and pour 2 teaspoons of beef drippings into each cup of a muffin pan. After you add the drippings to the pan, heat it in the oven for 5 minutes at 450 degrees Fahrenheit before dividing the egg and flour batter among the cups. Finally, put the pan back in the oven for 15-20 minutes before serving.
101089.pred: To make Yorkshire pudding, you will need a bowl of flour, salt, ground white pepper, eggs, milk, and water. First, make a well in the center of the flour and add the salt, pepper, and eggs. Stir the eggs slowly with a fork, bringing the flour in slowly. Then, add the milk and water to the mixture and stir until it becomes a smooth batter. Transfer the batter to a jug and refrigerate it for a whole day. Preheat the oven to a high temperature and place a thumb-sized piece of beef dripping in each cup of the Yorkshire pudding tin. Fill the tins about 2/3 full with the batter and bake for 25 minutes. Serve the Yorkshire pudding with roast beef and gravy.

101167.question: How To Clean a Candle Jar
101167.gt: To clean a candle jar, start by using a knife to break up and remove the leftover wax in the jar. Then, wipe out the inside of the jar with a paper towel, and place it on top of a folded dishcloth at the bottom of a pot. Next, fill the jar with water so it overflows at the top, and keep pouring water in until the water in the pot comes up to the sides of the jar. Finally, heat the water over medium heat until the remaining wax floats to the surface of the water.
101167.pred: To clean a candle jar, first, put the jar in the freezer overnight. Then, use a knife to remove the wax from the jar. Next, use hot water to remove the wick and any other debris. Scrub the jar with dish soap and a brush, and then remove any remaining glue or wax with hot water. Finally, rinse the jar thoroughly and it will be clean and ready to use again.

101612.question: How To Make Friends With a Stray Cat
101612.gt: To make friends with a stray cat, leave strong smelling food, like tuna or canned cat food, in the area where you’ve seen the cat to encourage it to return. After you've done this for a few days, wait beside the food and see if the cat still comes to eat it. If it does, try sitting down on the ground and moving slightly closer to the food each day so the cat gets accustomed to your presence. Additionally, try engaging in a non-threatening activity, like reading or gardening. Once the cat appears comfortable being near you, hold a treat, like a cube of chicken, in your hand to see if it will eat it. When the cat eats from your hand, try reaching out with the other hand and petting it.
101612.pred: To make friends with a stray cat, it is important to be patient and give the cat time to get comfortable with you. Start by offering the cat food and water, and let it approach you on its own terms. Avoid sudden movements or loud noises, as this can scare the cat away. Once the cat is comfortable enough to come close, try petting it gently and speaking to it in a calm voice. If the cat seems receptive, you can try to pet it more and offer it treats. Remember to always be respectful of the cat's boundaries and never force it to do anything it doesn't want to do. With time and patience, you can build a friendship with a stray cat.

101940.question: How To Clean a Stainless Steel Water Bottle
101940.gt: To clean a stainless steel water bottle, first fill the bottle halfway with a mixture of warm water and soap. Next, apply the cap and shake the bottle for a few seconds, then empty it out. After the bottle is empty, wash it with warm water to remove any remaining soap. After you’ve rinsed your bottle, place it upside down in your dish rack to dry. If you can’t get inside your bottle to clean it, use a bottle brush, which is a long, thin brush, to get into the corners. Remember to carefully clean any ridges around the mouth of your bottle with a sponge, since this is where debris can gather.
101940.pred: To clean a stainless steel water bottle, first, remove the cap and any other detachable parts. Then, fill the bottle with warm water and a small amount of dish soap. Shake the bottle vigorously to create a soapy solution. After that, rinse the bottle thoroughly with clean water to remove all soap residue. Finally, dry the bottle with a clean towel or let it air dry.

101972.question: How To Clean Oil Rubbed Bronze Fixtures
101972.gt: To rub down oil-rubbed bronze fixtures, start by wiping the fixture down with a damp, soft cloth, then drying it with another cloth right away so you don’t leave water spots. Alternatively, you can use a non-abrasive sponge to gently scrub away any hard water stains. If you still can’t get rid of the water stains, make a mixture of equal parts vinegar and water and rub it onto the fixture with a soft cloth or paper towels.. Then, let it sit for 15 minutes before wiping it off and drying the fixture with a soft, dry cloth.
101972.pred: To clean oil rubbed bronze fixtures, you can use a mixture of rubbing alcohol and water. First, mix the rubbing alcohol and water in a spray bottle. Then, spray the mixture onto the fixtures and let it sit for a few minutes. After that, wipe the fixtures with a clean cloth to remove any dirt or grime. This method is effective in removing dirt and grime from oil rubbed bronze fixtures.

102484.question: How To Install Crown Molding
102484.gt: To start installing crown molding, nail the first piece in place with finishing nails. You might want to have somebody help, since it’s easier to have one person hold the molding while the other hammers it down. Then, if your room is longer than your molding and you had to make scarf cuts to join 2 pieces, put a thin layer of glue on the cut of the first piece, fit the joint snugly, and fasten the second piece with nails, wiping away any glue. Keep going around the room in one direction until you’re done.
102484.pred: To install crown molding, you will need to first determine the quantity of molding you will need and calculate the length of each wall. Then, you will need to cut the molding using the opposite angle of the molding already installed. After that, you will need to measure the distance between the saw fence and the mark on the table saw and cut a scrap piece of wood with this measurement. Next, you will need to place the scrap piece against the ceiling and make a pencil mark below it. Then, you will need to measure the walls from corner to corner and write the distance on the top of each wall to 132nd of an inch below. After that, you will need to mark the location of the studs and push the corners in place and align them on the marks. Finally, you will need to nail the bottom of the molding with a brad power nailer over the stud marks and nail on the ceiling.

102549.question: How To Make Healthy Muffins
102549.gt: Before you start making healthy oatmeal muffins, preheat the oven to 350 °F and grease a muffin pan with oil. As the oven preheats, blend the oatmeal until it looks like coarse flour. Then, mix together the oatmeal and the rest of the dry ingredients in a mixing bowl with a wooden spoon. In a separate bowl, mash bananas and stir in the eggs, honey, milk, and vanilla. Next, combine all the ingredients and mix it thoroughly with a whisk. Once the batter has set for 10 minutes, scoop it into the muffin tin and bake the muffins for 20 to 23 minutes.
102549.pred: To make healthy muffins, you can follow the recipe provided in the video. First, preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit and grease a muffin tray with coconut oil. In a medium mixing bowl, mash the right bananas using a fork or a potato masher. Add an egg and vanilla extract and stir to combine. In a separate mixing bowl, combine the whole wheat, spelt flour, ground cinnamon, baking soda, and kosher salt and mix well. Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and stir until just incorporated. Fold in the chocolate morsels. Pour the mix into the prepared muffin tins, filling the cups approximately two thirds of the way full. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean and the tops are nice and golden brown. Let the muffins cool on a cooling rack.

102810.question: How To Clean Hedgehog Quills
102810.gt: Before you clean your hedgehog’s quills, you’ll need a toothbrush, clean hand towels, and a sink with 2 to 4 inches of lukewarm water. To begin, lower your hedgehog face up into the water. Keep a gentle but firm hold on your hedgehog until it settles and you can put it down. Then, fill a cup with water and pour it over your hedgehog’s body, but be careful to avoid its face, ears, and eyes. Dampen the toothbrush, then clean its quills gently in the direction of growth starting at the front of its body. Then rinse it in clean water.
102810.pred: To clean hedgehog quills, you can use a soft toothbrush to gently brush off any debris or dirt that may be stuck in the quills. It is important to be careful not to hurt the hedgehog while doing this. Additionally, you can use a wet towel to wipe off any dirt or debris that may be stuck to the quills. It is important to be gentle and not to use too much force when cleaning the quills.

103941.question: How To Make Tomato Chutney
103941.gt: Before you make tomato chutney, make sure you have all of the ingredients, like tomatoes, mustard seeds, cider vinegar, and scallions. Then, add your vinegar and spices to a pan and bring this to a boil while you chop your vegetables. Once your mixture is boiling, toss in your tomatoes, peppers, and scallions and reduce the heat to a simmer. Let this reduce uncovered for 75 minutes and you should end up with about 1.5 cups of chutney.
103941.pred: To make tomato chutney, first, cut the tomatoes into small pieces and cook them in a pan with oil. Then, add red chili powder, salt, and other spices to the pan and mix well. Cook the mixture for a few minutes until the tomatoes are soft and the flavors are well combined. Finally, transfer the chutney to a container and let it cool down before serving.

103985.question: How To Bathe a British Shorthair
103985.gt: To bathe a British Shorthair, start by filling a clean sink with 6-10 inches of warm water. Next, grasp the cat gently by its scruff and slowly lower it into the water. Stay calm and speak in a soothing voice until the cat relaxes into the water. Then, drizzle water over the cat's back, shoulders, and neck until the fur is thoroughly wet and massage a small amount of cat shampoo into its coat. Finally, rinse the shampoo from the cat's fur until the water runs clear.
103985.pred: To bathe a british shorthair, you should first wet the cat with a hose, then use a towel to dry the cat. After that, you can use a pair of scissors to trim the cat's nails. It is important to make sure that the cat is completely dry before you start trimming the nails.

104001.question: How To Clean Kittens
104001.gt: To clean a kitten, note that there are certain parts of their bodies that kittens can't reach to clean themselves, including their head, back, and behind. Therefore, you should clean these areas for them using a damp cloth. You should also wipe its body with a damp cloth after its eaten as many kittens are messy eaters. As you wipe your kitten, move in the direction of the fur to avoid irritating it, and pay special attention to the area under the tail, which can get dirty. When you wipe its face, work from the front to the back so you don't get water in its eyes. Alternatively, if your kitten doesn’t seem that dirty, use a brush to clean its coat.
104001.pred: To clean kittens, you will need a towel, flea comb, and tweezers. First, place the kitten on the towel and turn on the water. Pat the kitten with water and add a little bit of down dish soap. Keep adding water and spreading the down. Turn the kitten around and look for fleas. Use tweezers to pluck the fleas and put them in the water. Another method is to use the flea home and brush the kitten. Make sure there is no more soap and turn off the water. Wrap the kitten up and they will fall asleep.

105231.question: How To Clean and Maintain Your Flute
105231.gt: You should clean and maintain your flute after each use. To clean it, gently unscrew the head-joint and foot-joint from the body of the flute, then wrap a soft cotton or microfiber cloth around your cleaning rod. Gently pass the cloth through each section of the flute, twisting the rod to ensure any moisture inside of the flute has been absorbed. Carefully polish the outside of the flute, including the keys, with a clean microfiber cloth. Avoid touching the key pads while you are cleaning, since they are easy to damage.
105231.pred: To clean and maintain your flute, you can use a tarnish cloth to remove any brown spots or tarnish. Start by cleaning the head joint in a circular motion, avoiding the core and crown. Then, clean the inside of the mouth hole and the keys with a gentle back and forth motion. For the tubing, use the same circular motion to remove any black gunk. After cleaning, use a polishing cloth to give the flute a nice shine and remove any remaining debris. Remember to be gentle when cleaning the keys and avoid using the tarnish cloth on the small mechanism.

105243.question: How To Clean a Ferret's Ears
105243.gt: To clean a ferret's ears, start by getting a ferret-safe ear cleaning solution from your local pet store. Then, place the bottle in warm water for 10 minutes so the solution isn't cold when you use it. Next, pick up your ferret by the scruff, which is the loose skin on the back of its neck, and gently wipe its ears with the cleaning solution using a cotton swab. Avoid pushing the swab down into your ferret's ear canal, and just focus on the outer folds of the ear.
105243.pred: To clean a ferret's ears, you will need a Q-tip and a small container of water. First, wake up the ferret slowly and make sure it is not too hyper. Then, dampen the Q-tip with water and gently clean the ferret's ears by going around the sides. Avoid sticking the Q-tip down the ear canal as it can damage the eardrum. Repeat the process on the other ear.

105269.question: How To Make Relish
105269.gt: To make relish, start by dicing cucumbers, red and green bell peppers, and a yellow onion. Then, soak the vegetables in a bowl of water for 6 hours, changing out the water after 5 hours. Next, simmer vinegar, sugar, minced garlic, dill seeds, mustard seeds, celery seeds, and turmeric in a saucepan for 5 minutes before adding the diced vegetables. Finally, bring everything to boil, and reduce the heat to a simmer for 10 more minutes.
105269.pred:
To make relish, you will need to follow these steps:
1. Start by cutting the vanilla beans in half using a knife.
2. Place the vanilla beans in a bottle, making sure to cover them with vodka. The ratio is one vanilla bean per 2 ounces of liquor.
3. Shake the bottle every couple of days to ensure the vanilla beans are well-mixed with the vodka.
4. Allow the mixture to steep for at least 3 to 4 weeks before using it. The longer it steeps, the deeper and more intense the flavor will be.
5. Once the steeping time is complete, you can use the vanilla extract in your cooking or as a gift for others.

105386.question: How To Make Bhel Puri
105386.gt: To make dry bhel puri, start by blending green chili, lemon zest, and salt in a food processor. Then, toast some puffed rice in the oven for 10 minutes at 250 degrees Fahrenheit. While the rice is in the oven, chop up some unripe mango and red onion. Next, once the rice is done, transfer it to a serving bowl and top it with the chopped mango and onion, the green chili seasoning you blended earlier, and some cilantro, shelled peanuts, bhel sev, puris, and lemon juice. Finally, mix everything together before serving.
105386.pred: To make bhel puri, you will need to prepare the bhatura as shown in the video. Once the bhatura is ready, you can fill it with the bhel mixture, which typically consists of puffed rice, onions, tomatoes, and a spicy tamarind chutney. The bhel puri is then served as a popular Indian street food.

105393.question: How To Make Indian Egg Curry
105393.gt: To make Indian egg curry, start by hard boiling and peeling some eggs. Then, cook black mustard seeds and onions in a pan over medium heat for 2-3 minutes, add cinnamon and green chilies and cook for 2 more minutes, and then add chopped tomatoes and cook for 10 more minutes. Next, add ginger, turmeric, red chili, coriander, tamarind paste, coconut milk, salt, and curry leaves to the pan and simmer everything for a few minutes. Finally, add the eggs to the pan and cook the curry over low heat for 5 minutes before serving it.
105393.pred: To make Indian egg curry, you will need to start by boiling eggs for 9 minutes. Then, heat oil in a pan and add whole spices such as black cardamom, green cardamom, cloves, bay leaf, and cinnamon stick. Once the spices start crackling, add in the boiled onion paste and mix well. Add salt to help the onion cook faster. Next, add ginger garlic paste and cook until it becomes light golden brown. Add turmeric powder, red chili powder, and garam masala powder along with butter and cook until the raw flavor of the spices goes away. Add fresh tomato puree and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add water to adjust the consistency and cook for 10 minutes. While the gravy is cooking, peel the hard-boiled eggs and pan-fry them with turmeric powder until they are evenly golden brown. Finally, add the fried eggs to the gravy and cook for another 30-40 seconds. Your Indian egg curry is now ready to be served with steamed rice or Indian bread.

105604.question: How To Make Citronella Candles
105604.gt: To make citronella candles, begin by melting cubed candle wax in a double boiler. Once it’s melted, mix in 1/2 a teaspoon of citronella essential oil per pound of wax. You can also add in any other essential oils, such as lemon or lavender, for scent. Next, cut a pre-waxed candle wick so it’s a few inches longer than the container and affix it to the bottom of your container. Secure the wick so it stands straight up in the container, and then pour in the wax.
105604.pred: To make citronella candles, you will need wax, wicks, sticks, and essential oil. First, place the pennies at the bottom of the pots to cover the holes. Then, place the wicks in the pots and wrap them around the sticks. Melt the wax in a pot with hot water and add the essential oil. Pour the melted wax into the pots, being careful not to spill. Let the candles cool and harden.

105767.question: How To Make Shrimp Alfredo
105767.gt: To make shrimp alfredo, start by peeling and deveining some shrimp. Then, cook garlic and butter in a saucepan over medium-high heat for 5 minutes before adding the shrimp. Next, cook the shrimp for 1-2 minutes, and then add half-and-half, salt, pepper, Parmesan, milk, and cornstarch, stirring everything until it thickens. Finally, cook pasta and broccoli, and mix them into the sauce with the shrimp before serving.
105767.pred: To make shrimp alfredo, start by boiling water in a pot and adding fettuccine noodles. While the noodles are cooking, soak shrimp in water and remove the skin and tails. Season the shrimp with Cajun seasoning, minced garlic, and black pepper. Heat a skillet with butter or margarine and fry the shrimp for a few seconds on each side. In a separate pot, melt butter or margarine and add cream, shredded parmesan cheese, and seasonings to make the alfredo sauce. Cook the sauce on low heat until it thickens, then add the cooked fettuccine noodles and shrimp to the sauce. Serve the shrimp alfredo on a plate and garnish with parsley flakes or chopped parsley.

106081.question: How To Make Vanilla Coke
106081.gt: To make your own vanilla Coke, pour a 12 oz can of Coke or a similar cola drink into a tall glass. Stir in 3/4 of a tablespoon of vanilla syrup, then taste the Coke to see if you like it. If you want more vanilla flavor, you can use as much as 2 tbsp of the vanilla. Add 2 tbsp of half-and-half if you want to turn your drink into a Polar Bear.
106081.pred: To make vanilla coke, you will need a glass, a bottle of Coca-Cola, and a bottle of vanilla essence. First, pour a small amount of vanilla essence into the glass. Then, pour a small amount of Coca-Cola into the glass. Finally, add a small amount of vanilla essence to the glass. Stir the mixture well and enjoy your homemade vanilla coke.

106090.question: How To Wash a Car by Hand
106090.gt: To wash a car by hand, start by spraying the entire car with water and washing the wheels. Then, soak a large mitt in soapy water and wash the car in sections, starting from the top and working to the bottom. Use a car cleaning spray to carefully remove bugs and bird droppings. After you’ve washed the car, rinse it thoroughly with water from top to bottom, and use clean, dry towels to soak up the excess moisture.
106090.pred: To wash a car by hand, start by rinsing the car from the top down to remove any dirt or debris. Next, clean the interior of the car to prevent dirt from getting on the exterior. Use a different mitt and wash bucket for cleaning the exterior to avoid mixing dirt with clean water. Apply car soap to protect the wax on the car. Clean under the hood and the jams, and use tire cleaner to clean the tires. Be careful not to let the cleaner get on aluminum surfaces. Finally, rinse the car with low-pressure water to cut drying time.

106150.question: How To Polish Stones
106150.gt: To polish a stone, start by dipping it in water before rubbing it all over with 60-grit sandpaper. For the best polish, regularly wet the stone as you use the sandpaper to wear down any sharp edges. Once the stone is rounded, use 160-grit sandpaper to rub out the scratches from the rougher sandpaper. Finish sanding the rock using 360-grit sandpaper, then polish the stone using stone polish and a damp denim cloth.
106150.pred: To polish stones, you will need sandpaper starting with 220 grit and then upgrading to 600 or 800 grit depending on the desired level of polish. First, take a finished patoski rock as a reference and compare it to the unfinished one. Then, use a sanding block to assist with the sanding process. Dip the stone in water to keep it wet and start sanding. Roll the stone to remove any white junk. Continue dipping the stone in water and sanding until you achieve the desired level of polish. The finished product should be very transparent and look like the finished patoski rock.

106333.question: How To Ice a Cupcake
106333.gt: To ice a cupcake, make sure the cupcake is completely cool before you get started or else the icing will melt off. Once the cupcake is cool, scoop up some icing with a butter knife and carefully spread it over the top of the cupcake. Keep spreading the icing around until it's in an even layer and the entire top of the cupcake is covered. When you're finished, store the cupcake in an airtight container in the fridge.
106333.pred: To ice a cupcake, you need to first scoop a dollop of frosting onto the cupcake and pat it around the edges to make it smooth. Then, you can use a knife to create a ridge around the cupcake by twisting the knife and lifting it up. Finally, you can use a spatula to create a swirl on top of the frosting.

106389.question: How To Make Cream Cheese Icing
106389.gt: To make cream cheese icing, start by beating some butter until it’s smooth and creamy. Next, stir vanilla extract and cream cheese into the creamed butter. Then, slowly add powdered sugar while you continue to mix the ingredients. If your icing come out too thick, add a splash of milk to thin it out. Additionally, if your icing tastes too sweet, squeeze a little lemon juice to bring back the tanginess of the cream cheese.
106389.pred: To make cream cheese icing, you will need 1 8 oz package of cream cheese, 1/2 cup of butter, 1 teaspoon of vanilla, and 2 cups of powdered sugar. First, add the cream cheese and butter to a mixer and mix until they are soft and well combined. Then, add the vanilla and mix until it is fully incorporated. Finally, add the powdered sugar slowly, scraping down the sides of the bowl as needed, until the icing reaches the desired consistency.

106443.question: How To Roll Fondant
106443.gt: Before you roll fondant, sprinkle a flat surface with icing sugar to prevent it from sticking. Then, knead the fondant for between 5-8 minutes, or until it's smooth. Next, roll the fondant into a thick, even disk with a rolling pin, taking care to apply steady pressure so the fondant rolls evenly. You should aim to make the disk as thick as a piece of cardstock if you're planning to cover a cake with it. If you're trying to make a circle, turn the fondant 90 degrees every few rolls and roll it out away from you.
106443.pred: To roll fondant, you need to first cut a piece of fondant to the desired size and thickness. Then, you can use a rolling pin to roll the fondant out to the desired thickness. It's important to work on a clean, flat surface to prevent the fondant from sticking. You can also use a fondant smoother to help smooth out any air bubbles or wrinkles in the fondant. Once the fondant is rolled out, you can use it to decorate cakes, cookies, and other baked goods.

109147.question: How To Make Clotted Cream
109147.gt: To make clotted cream in the oven, start by pouring a high-fat, not ultra-pasteurized cream into a heavy-bottomed pot with a lid and place it in an oven preheated to 180 degrees Fahrenheit for 8-12 hours. When the cream develops a thick, yellowish skin on top, remove it from the oven and allow it to cool to room temperature. The, place it in the refrigerator for another 8 hours. Finally, separate the clotted cream on top from the whey-like liquid below with a slotted spoon and store it in the refrigerator for 3-4 days.

111153.question: How To Blow a Bubble with Bubblegum
111153.gt: To blow the best bubbles with bubblegum, start by chewing a piece of gum until it’s soft and smooth, then use your tongue to roll the gum into a ball and flatten it against the roof of your mouth. Next, open your teeth slightly and push your tongue through the flattened gum, moving it vertically in front of your teeth. Gently blow as if you are sighing until you can feel the air begin to fill the gum and turn it into a bubble. Remove your tongue from the gum and keep blowing as long as you can, or until the bubble bursts.
111153.pred: To blow a bubble with bubblegum, you need to follow a series of steps. First, you need to buy some bubblegum. You can buy gum at pretty much every corner store. Chewing gums can be used to make bubbles, but they won't be as big and they'll usually pop too easily. To start off, select a pack of bubblegum like Double Bubble or Bazooka. Generally, if there is a picture of a bubble on the package, it's a good choice. Some gums are also stickier, making them harder to remove from your face when they pop. Usually, if you chew these gums a little longer before blowing a bubble, they won't be quite as sticky. Gums with less sugar often have a stronger gum base for making bubbles. Gum bases contain a long molecule that adds elasticity to the gum. The right amount will make for the best texture for bubbles. Avoid old gums. If your gum is stale, it will be more dry, harder to chew, and bad for making bubbles. Use fresh gum to get the best results. To chew the gum, you need to roll the gum into a ball with your tongue. Use the roof of your mouth to steady the gum in place while you work the ball shape. It doesn't have to be a perfect circular shape, just so that gum is compacted. Move this ball of gum so that it sits right behind your front teeth. Use your tongue to flatten the ball into a small, flat circle. Use the back of your teeth to help flatten it by pushing the ball into them. Open your teeth slightly and extend your tongue until it extends out of your mouth and is covered by a thin, stretched layer of bubblegum. You'll need to be very gentle or you might poke your tongue right through. If that does happen, just form the ball again and start over. Keep practicing as this step can be difficult. Practice in front of a mirror so you can see when the tip of the gum is in the right position. To blow the bubble, you need to breathe air into the pocket of gum around your tongue. Blow gently until you can feel the air begin to fill the gum and start to push the gum out of your mouth in a bubble shape. Many people make the mistake of blowing just out of their lips rather than using breath from deeper within. Lip breath is not strong enough to produce a proper bubble so be sure to put more energy into it. The appropriate way to push air into the gum is like producing a heavy sigh. Use your diaphragm to push the air and exhale. Once the air pressure starts expanding the gum, you can remove your tongue. The edges of your teeth will help to keep the gum in place. Keep blowing slow and steady as you gradually expand the gum. Keep your mouth open. Resist the urge to close your lips after removing your tongue. Keeping your mouth in an open position will give you a larger area to push air through. To keep blowing as long as you can, use slow, even breaths. This will allow your gum time to expand. See how big you can make a bubble before it pops. For the biggest bubbles, blow bubbles inside. Stay away from wind and hot or cold temperatures. Cold air and wind can pop your bubble early, while hot air can make it so pliable it gets limp. To seal off the bubble, press your lips together slightly to close the bubble. This will prevent the bubble from getting more air and becoming bigger than desired or from allowing the air in the bubble to escape. If you want to avoid the mess of a bubble popping in your face, you can draw the bubble back into your mouth and pop it with your tongue. Practice, practice, practice. You may not succeed the first few tries but that's all part of the fun. Just keep trying until it happens for you and you get the hang of what it feels like. Blowing bubbles can take some getting used to for your jaw, mouth, and diaphragm. With practice, you will strengthen the muscles and the process will become easier.

116555.question: How To Make Organic Pesticide

116663.question: How To Make Snickerdoodles

Finally, shape the dough into balls and roll each ball in a mixture of cinnamon and sugar before baking the cookies for 6-10 minutes at 400°F.

Preheat your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs and vanilla extract. Then, stretch two rubber bands onto the pegs without crisscrossing into an eight shape. Use your hook to pull the bottom rubber band over the top and push them down. Continue this pattern until you reach the desired length, then pull the bracelet off the loom and add a C clip for the closure.
117099.pred: To make a rainbow loom fishtail, you will need a rainbow loom kit, which includes a loom, rubber bands, and a hook. You will also need black and green elastic bands. First, put the black elastic band on the loom and twist it like a figure eight. Then, alternate the black and green elastic bands, looping them in straight and twisting them like a figure eight. Continue this process until you have the desired length. Once you have the desired length, take the loom out of the loom and pull the rubber bands out. Then, use a c-clip to connect the ends of the rubber bands.

117106.question: How To Make Loom Bands
117106.gt: To make a basic loom bands bracelet, start by twisting 1 band into an “8” and folding it in half to make a circle, which you can slide into a C-clip to start your bracelet. Then, slide a new band halfway through the circle and pull the ends together to form a loop. While you’re holding the loop, slide a new band through it. The previous band will become a link in the bracelet and this new band will become the band you pull into a loop to create the next link. Continue adding bands in this way until your bracelet is long enough, then slide the remaining loop into the C-clip to finish your bracelet.
