118182.question: How To Make Fake Poop for a Prank
118182.gt: If you want to prank someone with fake poop, try using an old toiler paper roll. Just tear the roll open, soak it in the water, then shape it to look like poop. For fake poop that's a little more realistic, mix powdered sugar, peanut butter, cocoa powder, and milk in a bowl. Once you’ve mixed them into a dark brown lump, shape it into poop, and leave it to dry. Then, just leave it around someplace for people to find.
118182.pred: To make fake poop for a prank, you will need a few squares of toilet paper and a marker. First, cover the toilet paper with the marker, making sure to cover enough to make it brown after being washed. Then, wash the toilet paper under running water, making sure to add enough water to make it bleed but not too much to wash it all away. After washing, shape the toilet paper into a cylinder type shape, making sure not to make too many lumps. Finally, place the fake poop on the toilet and make sure to wipe off any marks to make it look more realistic.

118293.question: How To Crystallize Honey
118293.gt: To crystallize honey, make sure you purchase unfiltered, pure honey, since this is the only kind that will crystallize. If your honey didn't already come in a plastic jar, you can transfer it to one when you get home to speed up the crystallization process. You can also mix 1-2 tablespoons of water into the honey and store it in your refrigerator to encourage crystallization.
118293.pred: To crystallize honey, you need to mix one kilo of newly harvested honey with 100 grams of already crystallized honey from the previous year's harvest. Stir the mixture vigorously for a minute in the morning and afternoon for three days. Keep the mixture in the refrigerator during this time. After a few days, the honey will turn white with small crystals. Mix the crystals with the rest of the honey and pour it directly into jars. Refrigerate the jars for a few weeks to get smooth and creamy honey without big crystals.

118369.question: How To Make Fabric Softener
118369.gt: To make your own fabric softener, try using vinegar for an eco-friendly alternative to commercial softeners. Mix together 1 gallon of vinegar with 25 - 30 drops of any essential oil to give the fabric softener a pleasant scent. When you want to use it, simply pour ¼ cup of the fabric softener directly into your load of washing during the rinse cycle. Then, continue the washing cycle and enjoy your naturally softened clothes. Alternatively, use hair conditioner, vinegar, and hot water to make your own fabric softener. Combine 3 cups of vinegar with 2 cups of hair conditioner and 6 cups of hot water. Then add ¼ - ½ cup of the fabric softener to the machine just before the rinse cycle begins. After you add the fabric softener, let the cycle run as usual.
118369.pred: To make fabric softener, you will need three ingredients: distilled white vinegar, hair conditioner, and water. First, mix the hair conditioner with water in a container. Then, add three cups of distilled white vinegar to the mixture. Stir the mixture well, and pour it into empty containers. The recipe makes 88 ounces of fabric softener, and it costs 1.6 cents per ounce to use.

118772.question: How To Froth Milk for Cappuccino Without Fancy Tools
118772.gt: To froth milk for cappuccino without fancy tools, pour ½ cup of milk into a glass jar with a tight fitting lid. Make sure the milk doesn’t rise above the halfway point to ensure there’s enough room for the froth to expand. Next, tightly replace the lid and shake the jar for about 30 seconds, until the milk becomes frothy and has almost doubled in size. Then, remove the lid and microwave the milk for 30 seconds, or until steam begins to rise from the milk.
118772.pred: To froth milk for a cappuccino without fancy tools, you can follow these steps: First, heat the milk in the microwave for about 1 minute until it is hot but not scalding. Then, take the jar of milk out of the microwave and place it on a flat surface. Next, use a spoon to vigorously stir the milk in a circular motion, starting from the center and moving outward. This will create a vortex and help to incorporate air into the milk, resulting in a frothy texture. Continue stirring for about 30 seconds to 1 minute, or until the milk has reached the desired level of frothiness. Finally, pour the frothed milk into your cappuccino or latte, and enjoy!

118776.question: How To Grind Coffee at Home
118776.gt: To grind coffee at home without a coffee grinder, try using the pulse setting on your blender to pulverize the coffee as finely as you can. Alternatively, use a mortar and pestle to grind the coffee the same way you would grind peppercorns and other spices. You can also try placing the beans between 2 sheets of waxed paper and smashing them with a hammer. No matter which method you use, make sure to grind your coffee just before you brew it so that it tastes as fresh as possible.
118776.pred: To grind coffee at home, you will need whole coffee beans and a coffee grinder or blender. Measure out the coffee beans you will need, and then pour them into the grinder or blender. The finer the coffee granules, the stronger the coffee. Coarser grounds produce better flavor and less bitterness if you're making drip coffee or using a French press. If you're using a blender, choose the pulse setting. Run the grinder or blender for several seconds, then check the beans. Grinding for too long generates unnecessary heat. Once the beans are as fine or coarse as you want them to be, brew some coffee. If you've never had coffee using freshly ground beans before, you'll notice the difference.

119128.question: How To Waterproof Fabric
119128.gt: To waterproof fabric, hold a can of waterproof sealer 6-8 inches away from the fabric and spray it in light, even layers. Make sure that the fabric is clean and dry before waterproofing, and only apply the spray in a well-ventilated area to avoid inhaling fumes. Once you’ve applied the sealer, wait for it to dry, then apply a second coat. Don’t forget to apply seam sealer to all the seams for extra water protection.
119128.pred: To waterproof fabric, you can apply a waterproofing spray or treatment to the fabric. This will create a barrier that prevents water from penetrating the fabric. It is important to follow the instructions on the product label and apply the treatment evenly to the fabric. Additionally, it is recommended to test the fabric for water resistance before applying the treatment to ensure that it is suitable for waterproofing.

119131.question: How To Apply a Cold Compress
119131.gt: To apply a cold compress, start by elevating the part of your body that's swollen or in pain, which will help reduce the swelling. Then, wrap a compress in a towel so it doesn't come into direct contact with your skin, which can cause further injury. When you apply the compress, press it down over the whole area to make sure the injury gets sufficient icing. After 15 minutes, remove the compress, since keeping it on any longer can damage your skin. Once you’ve waited 2 hours, apply another compress in the same way. Make sure to assess your injury to determine whether you need medical attention, like if you’ve fractured a bone or dislocated something.
119131.pred: To apply a cold compress, you will need a bowl, some ice cold water, a clean washcloth, and optionally, some ice cubes or an ice pack. First, fill a bowl with ice cold water and add ice cubes if available. Then, dip a folded washcloth into the bowl for about 10 seconds and ring out the excess water. Press the chilled washcloth to the inflamed area and keep it there until the compress loses its chill. An ice pack will stay colder longer than a washcloth, but wrap it in a clean cloth or towel first. It should never come in direct contact with the skin. Refresh your cold water supply if it loses its chill and continue dipping, ringing, and applying as needed. For acute injuries, that is sudden trauma, ice helps constrict the blood vessels, decreasing swelling in the area.

119416.question: How To Make a Ninja Star from Square Paper
119416.gt: To make a ninja star from square paper, cut a square piece of paper in half to make 2 rectangles, and fold each rectangle in half vertically. Then, crease the rectangles horizontally, taking the bottom and top pieces to make cross-folds in a “Z” shape. Flip the paper over, and fold the squares of each paper to make triangles. Fold the triangles into the center, making two parallelograms, and unfold the outer flaps of the papers before placing them on top of each other in an cross shape. Tuck the triangle flaps into the pockets of the papers and enjoy.

120375.question: How To Test for Asbestos
120375.gt: If you want to test for asbestos, keep in mind that asbestos is only dangerous when it degrades and becomes airborne. Therefore, if you don't see signs of disintegrating pipes, insulation, walls, vinyl flooring, or other old materials in your home, testing for asbestos may not be necessary. If you do see signs of disintegrating materials, or if you just want to be safe, hire an approved contractor to come and test the area.
120375.pred: To test for asbestos, you can use the asbestos testing kit available from Test for Asbestos. The kit allows you to easily test materials you suspect may contain asbestos without having to pay the significant fee an asbestos surveyor would charge. You can return the samples you've taken to test for asbestos, and the UKAS lab results will be provided within 24 hours. This allows you to get on with your job or project with complete peace of mind.

120389.question: How To Make a Rose out of a Cloth Napkin
120389.gt: The easiest way to make a rose out of a napkin is to fold the napkin in half diagonally, then roll the folded side up halfway and flip the napkin over. Fold one “tail” into the other side and repeat with the other tail. Roll the napkin until it reaches the other side, and tuck in any extra cloth that’s sticking out. Pull apart the two flaps inside the rolled up napkin and turn it over to appreciate your creation!
120389.pred: To make a rose out of a cloth napkin, you need to start by folding the napkin in half and then rolling it up. After that, you need to twist the napkin to form the stem and then pull the bottom layer of the napkin upwards to create a leaf. Finally, you can add more leaves to the rose by twisting the napkin.

120575.question: How To Make a Dog Bow Tie
120575.gt: To make a dog bow tie, measure around the base of your dog's neck and cut out a large rectangle of fabric that accommodates the measurement. Next, fold the fabric in half crosswise, with the right sides facing each other, and stitch along 2 of the edges. Then, turn the fabric right side out before stitching the other edges closed. Finally, press the bow body flat with an iron, concentrating on the 4 edges.
120575.pred: To make a dog bow tie, you will need fabric, hair ties, hot glue, and a hot glue gun. First, fold the fabric into thirds and then fold one end into the center. Next, fold the other end into the center and make a rectangular piece. Then, fold the middle portion that will go over the center knot where you will glue. After that, fold the fabric in half and then fold the other two sides up like an accordion style to make the bow tie shape. Hook the hair tie down the two pieces so the bow tie doesn't go flapping too much. Flip the bow tie over and fold the hair tie in the center and come up either side. Measure the center piece and trim it if necessary. Finally, slide the collar through both of the two hair tie loops and clip it on.

120722.question: How To Shell Pecans
120722.gt: To shell pecans, take 2 nuts and place them in 1 hand. Then, close your fist around the nuts and squeeze them together until the shells crack enough to peel them off. You can also place the nut on a hard surface and hit it with a hammer to break the shell; however, using this method may also break the nut apart. If you have a nutcracker, place a pecan between the arms of the nutcracker and gently squeeze it until you hear a crack, being careful to not crush the nut inside. Once you crack the shell, peel it away and enjoy your pecans.
120722.pred: To shell pecans, you need to clip off the ends of the pecan, then clip the sides. After that, pull the pecan apart and remove the shell.

120779.question: How To Roast Raw Almonds
120779.gt: To roast raw almonds, start by spreading them in a single layer on an ungreased baking sheet. You can also add sugar, honey, garlic powder, or salt to add some flavor to your almonds. Once you’ve spread them on a tray, place them in the oven at 350 degrees Fahrenheit for 10-15 minutes or until they’re golden brown. While they’re roasting, stir the almonds with a spatula so they cook evenly. When the almonds are cooked, remove them from the oven and transfer them to another baking sheet, which will cool them down. If you want to store your roasted almonds, make sure they’ve cooled down completely before sealing them in a container to prevent them going moldy from excess moisture.
120779.pred: To roast raw almonds, set your oven to 350 degrees and place 1 to 2 pounds of fresh raw almonds in a nine by 12 baking pan. Spread them evenly and bake for 15 minutes. After 15 minutes, open the oven door, stir the almonds, and close the door. Set the timer for another 10 minutes. Pay attention to the smell, as it indicates the almonds are cooking. After 20 to 25 minutes, take the almonds out of the oven, check their color, and let them cool on a smooth, cool surface for about half an hour.

121100.question: How To Remove Rust from Pots and Pans
121100.gt: If you want to remove rust from pots and pans, use a gentle abrasive, like salt, that will scrape up the rust without damaging the metal. To scrape off the rust, cover the bottom of the pan with a thin layer of salt and scrub it in using a brown paper bag until the rust is lifted off. Alternatively, soak the pan overnight in a solution of water and lemon juice or vinegar to weaken the rust. Then, use a lemon rind to gently scrub away the rust. For bigger patches, opt for steel wool.
121100.pred: To remove rust from pots and pans, you can use a potato and salt. First, take two tablespoons of salt and rub it on the rusted area of the pan. Then, use a potato to scrub the area and remove the rust. Rinse the pan and repeat the process until the rust is completely removed.

121882.question: How To Care for an Asparagus Fern
121882.gt: To care for an asparagus fern, place it in a location that where it can grow at least 4 high and 3 feet wide. This spot should be between 50 to 75ºF and get sunlight in the mornings. Fertilize your plant every 3-4 weeks between March and November and water your fern 1-2 times a week, or whenever the soil feels dry to the touch. To propagate an apsaragus fern, you can slice the root ball into half or quarter sections with a knife and repot the sections of root ball into a few different planters.
121882.pred: The video provides some tips on how to care for an asparagus fern. It is recommended to plant it in the spring and to fertilize it at least twice. It can grow in a variety of locations, from full shade to full sun. However, it is important to note that it is an invasive plant and should not be grown in areas where it already exists. If you choose to grow it outdoors, you should sometimes cut new branches that grow outside and clean the inner part from the leaves.

121953.question: How To Plant a Seed in a Pot
121953.gt: Planting a seed in a pot is a great way to start both indoor and outdoor plants. To get started, you'll need a seed starting tray or a large pot with drainage holes. Fill your starting tray or pot with a soil designed for starting seeds, dampen the soil, and plant your seeds in it. Follow the instructions on your seed packet for how deep and far apart your seeds should be. After you plant your seeds, keep them somewhere warm where they'll receive plenty of sunlight. Water the soil whenever it starts to dry and turn the tray or pot 90 degrees every day to help your seeds grow.
121953.pred: To plant a seed in a pot, first fill the pot with good soil and make sure it is about 3/4 full. Then, plant the seed at a depth of about 1/4 inch and make sure to keep the soil moist. Finally, place the pot in a sunny spot and wait for the seeds to germinate.

121968.question: How To Plant Seeds in a Basic Seed Tray
121968.gt: To plant seeds in a basic seed tray, first put your tray on a larger plastic tray or rimmed baking pan. Fill the cells with seed starter mix and water them. Then, use your finger to poke a ¼-inch deep hole in each cell before you plant at least 2 seeds in each hole. Next, cover all the cells with more seed starter mix, and press down gently so the seeds touch the mix. Put some water in the bottom of your tray or pan, then cover it with plastic wrap to create a moist growing environment for your plants. Finally, put the tray in a warm spot and watch your plants grow!
121968.pred: To plant seeds in a basic seed tray, you need to fill the tray with soil and moisten it. Then, sprinkle the seeds in the tray, making sure to label each tray with a label. You can also use plastic domes to keep the moisture in and protect the seeds from drying out. Give the seeds good light and check them every day. Once the seeds start setting their full first leaves, you can start letting them have more air and eventually take the dome off.

122795.question: How To Make Chicharrón
122795.gt: To make chicharron, start by boiling your pork skins for between 1-2 hours until the skins are soft. Then, place the skins on a cooling rack above a baking tin to catch the drippings before transferring the rack to the fridge to chill the skins for several hours. Dry the skins in the oven at 200 degrees F for 8 hours, then split the skins into long strips and deep fry them in vegetable oil for 20 seconds. Finally, sprinkle the chicharrons with salt and serve them immediately.

122799.question: How To Make Chimichangas
122799.gt: To make chimichangas, start by cooking ground beef or shredded chicken with onion, garlic, beans, and red chili. Once you've made the filling, roll it into some tortillas like you would with burritos. Then, fry the chimichangas in oil over a stovetop and serve. For a healthier alternative, you can cook the chimichangas in the oven for 20 minutes at 450°F.
122799.pred: To make chimichangas, you will need to start by mixing flour and water in a bowl. Then, add yeast to the mixture and let it sit for 10 minutes. After that, add oil and mix the ingredients together. Once the dough is ready, knead it and let it rest for 30 minutes. After resting, roll out the dough and place it on a baking sheet. Drizzle olive oil on top of the dough and let it rest for another 30 minutes. Finally, bake the dough in the oven for 20 minutes at 430 degrees Fahrenheit.

122809.question: How To Make Mexican Corn
122809.gt: To make the Elotes style of Mexican corn, first preheat your grill to medium-high. While the grill is preheating, remove the husks of four ears of corn, and rinse and dry the cobs. When the grill is heated, place the cobs over direct heat and cook them for 7-10 minutes, or until they are evenly charred. Make sure to turn the corn every few minutes with a pair of tongs. Next, brush the corn with butter and a coat of mayonnaise. Finally sprinkle grated cotija cheese, chopped cilantro, and chili powder on top.
122809.pred: To make Mexican corn, you will need to cut the kernels off the corn and cook them in a skillet with vegetable oil. Once the corn is cooked, add mayonnaise, mild chilies, cilantro, lime juice, chili powder, and cotija cheese to the skillet. Mix all the ingredients together and serve.

122813.question: How To Make Pozole
122813.gt: To make pozole, start by toasting chiles, onion, and garlic in a hot skillet until they are blackened in a few spots. Then, purée them in a blender with roasted tomatoes and pour the sauce into a large stockpot. Next, add water, vinegar, sugar, and salt and bring it to a simmer. After 20 minutes, stir in browned pork cubes, chicken broth, cilantro, salt, and hominy and let all the ingredients simmer for 20  minutes. Finally, reduce the heat, cover the pot, and continue cooking the pozole for 3 hours, or until the pork is tender.
122813.pred: To make pozole, you will need a pot, a stove, and a variety of ingredients such as meat, vegetables, and spices. First, you will need to chop up the meat and vegetables and add them to the pot. Then, you will need to add the spices and let the mixture cook on the stove for a while. Once the mixture is cooked, you can serve it with tortillas and other toppings. The man in the video demonstrates how to make pozole by showing the steps and providing instructions.

122842.question: How To Color Air Dry Clay
122842.gt: Before coloring air dry clay, knead the clay so it’s soft, which will allow it to absorb the color more quickly and evenly. Next, add a drop of colorant to the clay and knead it in until the entire piece is colored evenly. Continue adding 1 drop of colorant at a time and kneading the clay thoroughly after each drop to avoid getting too strong of a color. Once you achieve the color you want, sculpt and dry the clay as usual.
122842.pred: To color air dry clay, you can use a variety of methods. One common method is to add a few drops of food coloring to the clay while it is still wet. You can mix the food coloring into the clay with your hands or use a toothpick to create a marbled effect. Another method is to use acrylic paint or spray paint to color the clay after it has dried. To do this, you can apply the paint to the clay with a brush or sponge and then let it dry completely. It's important to note that the color may not be as vibrant as it would be with a clay body, but it can still be a fun and creative way to add color to your air dry clay projects.

122854.question: How To Make a Clay Rose
122854.gt: To make a clay rose, start by rolling a chunk of clay into a ball, dividing the ball into seven similarly-sized pieces, and rolling those pieces into balls. Take the smallest ball and press it into a guitar-pick-shaped “petal” with the pointy part thicker than the rounded part, then fold the sides gently inward. Repeat with a slightly bigger ball of clay, then fold this second petal around the first. Continue attaching slightly larger petals in a spiral, then pinch the bottom of your rose to connect all the petals.
122854.pred: To make a clay rose, you will need some clay, a rib, a knife, a rolling pin, and a texture mold. First, roll out a thin sheet of clay and use a paper towel to prevent sticking. Then, use a rib to smooth out the clay and cut out the area that will become the rosebud. Roll the clay into a rose shape, and use a knife to create a hole in the bottom of the rose. Insert a stem into the hole and use a little vinegar to attach the pieces. Next, cut out small slices of clay to make leaves and use a texture mold to create veins and other textures. Finally, attach the leaves to the stem and let the rose dry before firing and glazing.

123312.question: How To Create a Strong Burning Charcoal Fire
123312.gt: To create a strong burning charcoal fire, start by forming a pyramid of charcoal briquettes in the center of your grill and squirting some lighter fluid into the middle of it. Then, let the charcoal soak for a few minutes, apply a little more lighter fluid, and ignite the fire. Once the briquettes are mostly gray and white, spread them out and start cooking. To keep your fire burning strong, add between 5 and 10 more coals every 30 minutes.
123312.pred: To create a strong burning charcoal fire, you can use a blow dryer to blow air onto the charcoal. This will help to increase the oxygen flow and make the fire burn more intensely. Additionally, you can use a lighter to ignite the charcoal and help it catch fire more quickly.

123325.question: How To Use a Grill Pan
123325.gt: To use a grill pan, preheat it over medium-high heat for 5 minutes before cooking on it, which will allow the entire surface of the pan to get hot. While the pan is heating up, brush oil onto the food you'll be cooking. Avoid putting oil directly in the grill pan since it could burn and ruin the flavor of your food. Once the grill pan is preheated, put the food in the pan and cover it with aluminum foil so it cooks faster. Let the food cook in the pan and use tongs to flip it once halfway through the cooking time.
123325.pred: To use a grill pan, you can place it on a stove top or in an oven under the broiler. The grill marks on the pan help separate the grease from the meat as it cooks, and the two lips on the opposite ends allow you to lift the pan and pour out the grease that you don't want going back into your food.

123330.question: How To Dewax Lemons
123330.gt: Lemons are often coated in a special wax to keep the peel glossy and you may want to remove this if you plan to zest the lemon. One of the easiest ways to do this is by using vinegar to make a fruit and vegetable wash. Combine one part white vinegar with three parts water in a spray bottle. Then, spray the solution over the lemon peels and allow it to sit for 2 - 5 minutes. Next, scrub the lemons with a scrubbing brush under cool, running water to remove the vinegar solution and the wax.
123330.pred: To dewax lemons, you should cut off the ends of the lemon and use the inside part to scrub the outside. This will remove the wax without using soap or any other chemicals.

123331.question: How To Get Rid of Weevils (Flour Bugs)
123331.gt: To get rid of weevils, start by removing all food items from your pantry that have been invested with them and discard the items immediately. Transfer any uninfested foods to airtight containers with hard shells to prevent weevils from getting into them in the future. Clean and vacuum out your pantry thoroughly to remove any lingering pests, then wipe it down with vinegar before moving the food back in!
123331.pred: To get rid of weevils, you can use a mixture of water and dish soap. Mix a few drops of dish soap in a bowl of water and then soak the weevils in it. The dish soap will help to suffocate the weevils. You can also use a vacuum cleaner to suck up the weevils. Make sure to dispose of the weevils properly after you have removed them from your home.
